name: 01d-kabuto_Fixed.glsl
description: Audio-reactive tunnel with spheres and planes. Bass frequencies control sphere size, audio modulates colors and textures throughout the raymarched scene.

name: charstiles_Fixed.glsl
description: Audio-reactive sphere grid tunnel with plasma effects. Audio frequency data drives color intensity and visual brightness throughout the raymarched scene.

name: Colorflow orbV1_Fixed.glsl
description: Highly audio-reactive orb with turbulent glow. Bass/mid/treble frequencies control sphere size, turbulence, glow intensity, and overall brightness dynamically.

name: EVOKE 2019 Shader Showdown_Fixed.glsl
description: Complex fractal tunnel scene from EVOKE 2019. This shader is static with no audio reactivity, featuring intricate raymarched geometry and volumetric clouds.

name: fragmentcompofix_skycolorspinner_300es_Fixed.glsl
description: Audio-reactive sky spinner with voronoi patterns. Audio controls spinner rotation, FOV, star field flicker, sky texture scrolling, and glow intensity.

name: Quasi Crystals2_Fixed.glsl
description: Quasi-crystal patterns using log-polar coordinates. This shader is static with no audio reactivity, displaying animated geometric wave interference patterns.

name: Quasi-crystals_Fixed.glsl
description: Animated quasi-crystal with HSV coloring. This shader is static with no audio reactivity, showing plane wave interference in log-polar space.

name: reflected structure by musk for TDF 2021_Optimized.glsl
preview_image: reflected structure by musk for TDF 2021_Optimized.JPG
description: Audio-reactive reflected structure with wave patterns. Audio modulates color transitions, wave intensity, camera rotation, and overall brightness with reflections.

name: Reflecting Crystals_Fixed.glsl
description: Fractal crystals with gyroid sphere and reflections. This shader is static with no audio reactivity, featuring IFS fractals and multiple reflection passes.

name: semifinal2-blueberry_Fixed.glsl
description: Audio-reactive 2D/3D hybrid with pulsing patterns. Audio controls sphere size, pattern colors, circle radii, brightness, and switches between 2D and 3D scenes.

name: semifinal2-tapped_Fixed.glsl
description: Audio-reactive circular pattern array with noise. Audio affects circle radius, movement offsets, and color intensity creating pulsing organic formations.

name: tdf-16ms_glsl-graphics-compo_nunu-00_Fixed.glsl
description: Procedural noise patterns with domain warping. This shader is static with no audio reactivity, showcasing value, gradient, and Perlin noise techniques.

name: the_fractal_Fixed.glsl
description: Audio-reactive Menger sponge fractal tunnel. Audio controls movement speed, rotation, time modulation, and color intensity throughout the animated fractal journey.

name: the_grid_Fixed.glsl
description: Audio-reactive grid tunnel with depth of field. Audio affects camera offset, DOF, BPM, rotation, grid thickness, pattern modulation, and background colors.

name: Waveform.glsl
description: Audio-reactive 3D waveform visualization with reflections. Raymarched scene where audio data creates a flowing waveform surface with mirror reflections and color cycling.

name: Xor Mashup 001.glsl
description: Audio-reactive molten heart with speak overlay. Combines techno god background with dynamic overlay effects, bass controls radius and ring width, treble affects color shifts.

name: Xor Mashup 003.glsl
description: Audio-reactive volumetric glow with mosaic patterns. Features dynamic movement, frequency-based color modulation, and complex geometric transformations driven by audio data.

name: Base Vortex.glsl
description: Audio-reactive tunnel vortex effect with rotating geometry. Bass frequencies control tunnel depth and rotation speed, creating dynamic visual flow synchronized to music.

name: Bubble Colors.glsl
description: Audio-reactive colorful bubble patterns with gentle pulsing. Bass and kick frequencies drive bubble size and color intensity for smooth, organic visual effects.

name: Colorful Columns.glsl
description: Audio-reactive colorful column visualization with frequency-based height mapping. Each column responds to specific frequency ranges creating a dynamic spectrum display.

name: Colorful Columns_V2.glsl
description: Enhanced version of Colorful Columns with improved anti-flickering and smoother audio processing. Features averaged sampling for more stable visual response.

name: Cosmic Energy Streams1.glsl
description: Audio-reactive cosmic energy streams with flowing tendrils and dynamic lighting. Bass, mid, and high frequencies control stream intensity and particle effects.

name: Cosmic Nebula2.glsl
description: Audio-reactive deep space nebula with stellar formation effects. Features gas clouds and star brightness that respond to audio input for cosmic ambiance.

name: Flowing Mathematical Patterns2.glsl
description: Audio-reactive mathematical flow patterns with advanced beat detection. Features multi-method beat analysis and bass-reactive color shifting for complex visual mathematics.

name: Fork Bass Vorte PAEz 125.1.glsl
description: Audio-reactive vortex tunnel variant with enhanced bass response. Features improved audio processing with smooth clamping to prevent extreme visual fluctuations.

name: Gyroid Art.glsl
description: Mathematical gyroid surface visualization with smooth organic forms. This shader is static with no audio reactivity, showcasing pure geometric beauty and mathematical precision.

name: Iridescent Breathing Orbs.glsl
description: Audio-reactive iridescent orbs with breathing animation. Bass and treble frequencies control orb size and color shifts, creating mesmerizing organic pulsing effects.

name: Luminous Nebulae.glsl
description: Audio-reactive luminous nebula with color-changing effects. Treble and mid-treble frequencies drive color palette transitions and nebula brightness for cosmic ambiance.

name: MoltenHeart.glsl
description: Audio-reactive molten heart with dual-layer raymarching. Bass and treble frequencies control layered effects, ring width, and sphere radius for intense visual impact.

name: Petal Drift.glsl
description: Audio-reactive drifting Gaussian petals with gentle lighting. Multi-frequency analysis drives petal movement, color palette switching, and global rotation effects.

name: sleeplessV4.glsl
description: Audio-reactive orb visualization with bass-driven brightness. Features configurable bass sampling and threshold controls for dynamic orb intensity and glow effects.

name: Sonic Nebula.glsl
description: Audio-reactive sonic nebula effect with multi-frequency response. Bass, mid, and treble frequencies control nebula density, color, and movement for dynamic space visuals.

name: Volumetric Glow2.glsl
description: Audio-reactive volumetric glow with subtle brightness pulsing. Bass and mid frequencies drive glow intensity and color modulation for atmospheric lighting effects.

name: Xor Mashup 002.glsl
description: Audio-reactive XOR pattern mashup with gentle enhancement. Bass, mid, and kick frequencies control pattern intensity and brightness for rhythmic visual effects.

name: Funky Flight.GLSL
description: Funky flight path visualization with smooth camera movement through 3D space. This shader is static with no audio reactivity, featuring dynamic flight trajectory and perspective effects.
